I’m Martina Tan, an artist & designer based in Boston, Massachusetts.

I’m from Mount Laurel, NJ.

In 2021, I’ll be graduating from Tufts University with two degrees in Cognitive and Brain Science and Visual Art, plus a Computer Science minor.
